statements: SELECT * FROM GeneticsData;
SELECT id, gene_name, allele_frequency FROM GeneticsData;
SELECT source_name, source_type, chromosome, variant_type FROM GeneticsData ORDER BY chromosome ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticsData WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, position FROM GeneticsData WHERE variant_type = 'SNP';
SELECT * FROM GeneticsData WHERE source_type = 'DNA' ORDER BY chromosome ASC, position DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(*) AS gene_count FROM GeneticsData GROUP BY gene_name HAVING gene_count > 5 ORDER BY gene_count DESC
SELECT AVG(allele_frequency) AS avg_freq, MIN(allele_frequency) AS min_freq, MAX(allele_frequency) AS max_freq FROM GeneticsData WHERE variant_type = 'SNP'
SELECT chromosome, gene_name, source_type FROM GeneticsData WHERE position BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY chromosome DESC, gene_name ASC
SELECT gene_name, variant_type FROM GeneticsData WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_name ASC
SELECT * FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome FROM genes WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_type FROM genes WHERE gene_type = 'Regulator' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT variation_name, variation_type FROM variations ORDER BY variation_name ASC;
SELECT genes.gene_name, variations.variation_name FROM genes INNER JOIN variations ON genes.gene_id = variations.gene_id WHERE genes.chromosome = 'Y';
SELECT gene_name, gene_type FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 1
SELECT * FROM genes WHERE chromosome = 'X'
SELECT gene_name, variation_name FROM genes JOIN variations ON genes.gene_id = variations.gene_id
SELECT * FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(variation_id) AS num_variations FROM genes JOIN variations ON genes.gene_id = variations.gene_id GROUP BY gene_name HAVING num_variations > 1
SELECT * FROM SampleData;
SELECT sample_name, genetic_data FROM SampleData WHERE sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sample_name FROM SampleData ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT sourceA_info FROM SourceAData JOIN SampleData ON SourceAData.sample_id = SampleData.sample_id;
SELECT sourceB_info FROM SourceBData JOIN SampleData ON SourceBData.sample_id = SampleData.sample_id WHERE sourceB_info LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM SampleData WHERE sample_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM SampleData ORDER BY sample_id DESC
SELECT sd.sample_id, sd.sample_name, sa.sourceA_info FROM SampleData sd INNER JOIN SourceAData sa ON sd.sample_id = sa.sample_id
SELECT sd.sample_name, sb.sourceB_info FROM SampleData sd LEFT JOIN SourceBData sb ON sd.sample_id = sb.sample_id WHERE sb.sourceB_info IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM SampleData sd JOIN SourceBData sb ON sd.sample_id = sb.sample_id JOIN SourceAData sa ON sd.sample_id = sa.sample_id WHERE sd.sample_name LIKE '%sample%';
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table2;
SELECT column3, column2, column1 FROM table3;
SELECT column1, column3 FROM table4;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM table1;
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE column1 = 10;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table2 WHERE column3 > 100;
SELECT column3, column2 FROM table3 WHERE column1 BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM table4 WHERE column1 < 50 ORDER BY column3 DESC;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table1 WHERE column2 LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY column3 ASC;
SELECT * FROM gene_info
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position FROM gene_info
SELECT gene_id, end_position FROM gene_info WHERE start_position > 10000
SELECT * FROM gene_expression ORDER BY expression_level DESC
SELECT variant_id, variant_type FROM gene_variants WHERE variant_position BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM gene_info ORDER BY gene_name DESC, chromosome ASC
SELECT gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM gene_info WHERE chromosome='X' LIMIT 10
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, assay_type FROM gene_info JOIN gene_expression ON gene_info.gene_id = gene_expression.gene_id WHERE expression_level > 0.5
SELECT variant_type, variant_position FROM gene_variants WHERE variant_position BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY variant_position ASC
SELECT gene_name, annotation_text, annotation_source FROM gene_info JOIN gene_annotations ON gene_info.gene_id = gene_annotations.gene_id WHERE annotation_source='NCBI' ORDER BY gene_name ASC
